tldr: Affected versions of this package leak sensitive information through Flare error messages. The error handling mechanism fails to properly sanitize or restrict exposed data, revealing critical information. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to gain insights into the systemâ€™s internals and launch targeted attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and if you are using Flare.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `spatie/laravel-ignition` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information
